entry.title: Why SegWit Anyway?
entry.summary: A bitcoin beginner, Dr. Praveen Baratam, has expressed his confusion regarding Segregated Witness (SegWit) in the Bitcoin network. He asks why a new data structure is required to separate signatures from the rest of the transaction data instead of computing the Transaction ID using the same method as the hash for signing transactions. The user's question highlights his lack of understanding of the technical details of SegWit and its benefits.
